FuncDef: This command allows BGP to advertise its best external route to a destination even when its best overall route is an internal route. Entering the command (or itsnoform) with no address family parameters is equivalent to specifying all supported address families.
CLIs: no advertise-external [ ipv4 ] [ ipv6 ] [ label-ipv4 ] [ label-ipv6 ]

ParaDef.Info: Enables or disables the best-external advertisement for unlabeled unicast IPv4 routes.
Enables or disables the best-external advertisement for unlabeled unicast IPv6 routes.
Enables or disables the best-external advertisement for labeled-unicast IPv4 routes.
Enables or disables the best-external advertisement for labeled-unicast IPv6 routes.
